title: GeoView Custom Legend Config Schema
comments: Configuration for the GeoView custom legend package.

isOpen.description: Whether the custom legend panel is initially open.

legendList.description: Ordered list of custom legend items to render.

legendTitle.description: Title/label shown for the legend item.

symbolUrl.description: URL of the symbol image to display for the legend item.

description.description: Optional descriptive text shown under the title.

version.description: Schema version used to validate this configuration.
